text: Ghandoura Subdistrict ( is a subdistrict of Jarabulus District in northern Aleppo Governorate, northwestern Syria. The administrative centre is the town of Ghandoura. At the 2004 census, the subdistrict had a population of 17,314. ==Towns and villages== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- |+ Towns and villages of Ghandoura Subdistrict !
